title: If someone near me passes wind,  should I renew MY Wudu? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: from tunisia if someone near me passes when should i renew my wudu no of course not this is not related to proxy uh uh passing of wind if someone passes when then it is okay for him he's a must for him to go and perform mudu why would i perform mudu for his breaking of this is not logical nor islamic
